name: structure-view
description: Structure View for ATOM, just like Outline view in Eclipse or Structure tool window in IDEA / WebStorm, provides quick navigation for symbols of source code with a tree view.

AutoscrollFromSource.title: Autoscroll from Source
AutoscrollFromSource.description: Enable this feature to have Atom automatically move the focus in the Structure View to the node that corresponds to the code where the cursor is currently positioned in the editor.
